text: @UN @antonioguterres Its your moral duty to make sure that refugees get proper information about COVID19. Rohingyas are under locked down since they are in Bangladesh. Your guidance for COVID19 is not reaching properly to the most persecuted minority in the world. Govt ban on internet must be lifted
